sentences: Ma olen maininud seda juba mitu korda.
Ta mainis, et tahab kohe koju minna.
Kõigepealt tuleb mainida, et see on väga oluline.
context: The word 'maininud' is the past tense of the Estonian verb 'mainima', which means to mention or reference something. It is commonly used in everyday conversations to indicate that something has been previously discussed or brought up.
